original_text: They said to you, ‘In the last days of this world, some people will laugh at God's message. They will say that it is silly to obey God. Instead, they will do the bad things that they want to do. Those things do not please God.’
korean_text: 그들이 너희에게 말하기를 마지막 때에 자기의 경건하지 않은 정욕대로 행하며 조롱하는 자들이 있으리라 하였나니

sentences.original_text: In the last days of this world
some people will laugh at God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 하나님의 말씀을 비웃을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will say that it is silly to obey God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님께 순종하는 것이 어리석다고 말할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Instead, they will do the bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 대신, 그들은 나쁜 것들을 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Those things do not please God
